Class BeerLibrary

java.lang.Object
  BeerLibrary

public class BeerLibrary
extends java.lang.Object

A beer library to record the beers stocked from several breweries.

Version:
Q3 part b
Author:
Sacha Ponniah

Constructor Summary

          Constructor for objects of class BeerLibrary
 
Method Summary
 void addMapEntry(java.lang.String aBrewery, java.util.Set<java.lang.String> aBeerSet)
          Adds brewery and set of beers produced by them to breweries map.
 void populateBreweries()
          Populates the receiver's breweries map with test data, with brewery names as keys and sets of beer names as values.
 void printMap()
          Prints out each brewery recorded in receiver's breweries map, along with set containing the beers stocked that are produced by each.
 void printMapValue(java.lang.String aBrewery)
          If brewery is in receiver's breweries map, prints set containing stocked beers produced by that brewery.

Constructor Detail

BeerLibrary

public BeerLibrary()
Constructor for objects of class BeerLibrary

Method Detail

addMapEntry

public void addMapEntry(java.lang.String aBrewery,
                        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> aBeerSet)
Adds brewery and set of beers produced by them to breweries map. If the brewery is already present in the breweries map, the existing set of beers is overwritten.

Parameters:
aBrewery - a single String, representing the name of a brewery.
aBeerSet - a Set of Strings, representing beers produced by that brewery.

populateBreweries

public void populateBreweries()
Populates the receiver's breweries map with test data, with brewery names as keys and sets of beer names as values.

printMap

public void printMap()
Prints out each brewery recorded in receiver's breweries map, along with set containing the beers stocked that are produced by each.

printMapValue

public void printMapValue(java.lang.String aBrewery)
If brewery is in receiver's breweries map, prints set containing stocked beers produced by that brewery. Otherwise, prints unsuccessful message.

Parameters:
aBrewery - a single String, representing the name of a brewery.
